# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_USES_MP_PLAYER_DAMAGE_MULTIPLIER

## Summary
Enable or disable the damage reduction multiplier (x0.5) we apply in MP when attacking a vehicle containing a player

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** useMultiplier
